publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1416# Mr Kenny MacAskill: International Refugee Week-That the Parliament notes that 14 to 20 June 2004 is International Refugee Week; welcomes the great social, cultural and economic benefits that refugees have brought to Scotland over the years; recognises that they continue to bring these benefits and in many instances arrive in Scotland as a result of war, and destitution caused thereby; notes that events are taking place worldwide to mark the week, and welcomes the establishment of the Edinburgh Refugee Centre at St George's West Church in Shandwick Place, Edinburgh, providing humanitarian support, advice and assistance for refugees and asylum seekers.
S2M-1416# International Refugee Week (lodged on 4 June 2004) Mr Stewart Maxwell*

S2M-1416# International Refugee Week (lodged on 4 June 2004) Donald Gorrie*, Linda Fabiani*, Alex Neil*, Christine Grahame*, Frances Curran*, Jackie Baillie*, Tricia Marwick*, Stewart Stevenson*, Bruce Crawford*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Eleanor Scott*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Jim Mather*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mike Pringle*, Richard Lochhead*, Fiona Hyslop*, Brian Adam*, Robert Brown*, Mary Scanlon*, Robin Harper*
S2M-1416# International Refugee Week (lodged on 4 June 2004) Shiona Baird*, Bristow Muldoon*, Rob Gibson*, Chris Ballance*, Michael Matheson*, John Swinburne*, Bill Butler*
S2M-1416# International Refugee Week (lodged on 4 June 2004) Mr Mark Ruskell*

S2M-1416# Mr Kenny MacAskill: International Refugee Week-That the Parliament notes that 14 to 20 June 2004 is International Refugee Week; welcomes the great social, cultural and economic benefits that refugees have brought to Scotland over the years; recognises that they continue to bring these benefits and in many instances arrive in Scotland as a result of war, and destitution caused thereby; notes that events are taking place worldwide to mark the week, and welcomes the establishment of the Edinburgh Refugee Centre at St George's West Church in Shandwick Place, Edinburgh, providing humanitarian support, advice and assistance for refugees and asylum seekers. Supported by: Mr Stewart Maxwell, Donald Gorrie, Linda Fabiani, Alex Neil, Christine Grahame, Frances Curran, Jackie Baillie, Tricia Marwick, Stewart Stevenson, Bruce Crawford, Tommy Sheridan, Mr Jamie Stone, Eleanor Scott, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Jim Mather, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Mike Pringle, Richard Lochhead, Fiona Hyslop, Brian Adam, Robert Brown, Mary Scanlon, Robin Harper, Shiona Baird, Bristow Muldoon, Rob Gibson, Chris Ballance, Michael Matheson, John Swinburne, Bill Butler, Mr Mark Ruskell, Elaine Smith*
S2M-1416# International Refugee Week (lodged on 4 June 2004) Trish Godman*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-1416# International Refugee Week (lodged on 4 June 2004) Nora Radcliffe*, Dennis Canavan*
